titles: An address of thanks to a good prince presented in the panegyrick of Pliny, upon Trajan, the best of Roman Emperours.
author: Pliny, the Younger.

publisher: Printed by M. Flesher for Tho. Fickus ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
